about_the_game:
"Pick Me Pick Me" is an innovative 2-player online game that brings the chaos and hilarity of dating to the virtual world. Step into the Battlefield of Love, where you'll compete to use your creative ideas to have an engaging conversation with different characters powered by AI, showing your stylish outfits and taste, and placing strategic skill cards to win over your virtual partner and outshine your opponent.

In this demo, you and your friend will have the chance to meet two exciting AI characters: Ada and Calvin. Each character brings their own unique personality to the table, setting the stage for some entertaining and unpredictable moments. The demo includes two rounds of gameplay, with each round lasting between 15 and 18 minutes. Get ready for a sneak peek into the chaos and fun of "Pick Me Pick Me", as you dive into the Battlefield of Love!

Key Features

Each with their own personalities, passions, dreams, and even things they absolutely can’t stand. Do you have the charm, wit, and strategy to win them over? Outsmart your opponent by carefully choosing your responses and actions, flipping every scenario in your favor, and capturing the heart of your date!  You can not select whom you are dating with, the character is randomly assigned to each round, which means you can not trick your competitor.  More you know of each character, the more fun topics you can have.  

You'll experience cutting-edge AI technology that delivers clever, adaptive, and context-aware dialogue, designed to stay true to each character. Characters respond to you in real-time, offering fresh, dynamic interactions with every playthrough, ensuring that every conversation feels unique and personalized.

See what your competitors are saying in real-time and use that intel to craft the perfect responses. Outsmart, outplay, and out strategize as you shape every conversation to gain the upper hand. The battlefield is your dialogue—are you ready to dominate?

Skill cards give you options to buff yourself or debuff your rival friend. You'll collect cards during gameplay, and these are split into four categories:

  • Red: Debuff your opponent.

  • Green: Provide bonuses like a shield for yourself.

  • Blue: Disrupt your rival's actions.

  • Purple: Are context and environment-related events. You can use them to spoil your rival's date—but sometimes that’s not a bad thing, as certain AIs might actually like it!

Players speaking different languages can play together! Since Pick Me Pick Me is available in multiple languages, you can face off against your friend even if you don't speak the same language. Argue in the language you’re most comfortable with and challenge your opponent, no matter what they speak!

"Pick Me Pick Me" is a perfect party game for players who enjoy competitive, yet lighthearted, gaming experiences with a unique AI twist.
